ScriptAction.Script:
SetLocation("North Finmer, Watchtower")
SetInventoryEnabled(true)
AddLink(ECompass.North, "Scene_TownMarket")
AddLink(ECompass.South, function()
    -- player can pass if MQ01 was completed
    if Storage.GetFlag("mq01_done") then
        SetScene("Scene_RoadNorth")
    else
        Log("town_gate_mq01lock")
    end
end)

Log("town_gate_first")
Log("town_gate")
